Today it started. We continue with the 100 doses. Reconstruction of the state. Restarting the economy. ERT Justice
The partners, if somewhere in the depths of their minds, were that we would be the continuation of the previous governments, we certainly disappointed them.
For the first time, Europe admitted that there is an unprecedented humanitarian crisis in Greece due to a failed program
Europe has begun to become accustomed to the idea that there can be governments that go against neo-liberal dogmatism. #Greece
At the Eurogroup on February 20, we achieved no cuts in wages & pensions, no new dismissals.
Our country has been able to design and implement reforms that it proposes itself and not ready prerequisites. #Greece
Following the 20 February agreement, the government submitted its #Eurogroup's own reform plan. #Greece
Some of the technocrats who have not been able to realize that things have changed, try to bully with endemic.
We respond to them by voting today in the House for the response to the humanitarian crisis. #Greece
Some people are asking us to freeze bills. So that thousands of households who live without electricity continue to "unleash"? #Greece
Have we envisioned this Europe? Europe, with its choices, creates a humanitarian crisis for a people. #Greece
Today, we are pursuing basic needs as described in the Charter of Fundamental Rights of the EU Housing, feeding, energy.
The European Union is not the property of the technocrats. It has institutions and rules controlled by its peoples. #Greece

The first measure is to transform cash practice 2 and laundering of resources for election purposes in crime. #Anti-corruption
The second measure is the proposal for confiscation and return of illegally obtained goods. #Anti-corruption
The third measure is an urgent request from the project on early sale and seizure of illicit assets. #Anti-corruption
The fourth measure is a bill that amends the Server Statute to require #FichaLimpa for servers of the 3 powers in all instances
The fifth measure is urgently required in the vote on a bill that criminalizes illicit enrichment. #Anti-corruption
